bites.bite: The largest adm_1 is Antioquia department with 10 reports followed by Norte de Santander department with 7 reports.
The largest adm_2 is San Andrés de Cuerquía municipality with 4 reports followed by with 4 reports.
The largest adm_1 is Antioquia department with 827 reports followed by Cauca department with 279 reports.
The largest adm_2 is with 1038 reports followed by Bogotá municipality with 82 reports.
